text: Yemwe abemeye! Mwategetswe guhorera abishwe22; uwigenga agahorerwa uwigenga, umucakara agahorerwa umucakara n’umuntu w’igitsina gore agahorerwa undi w’igitsina gore. Ariko uwagira icyo ababarirwaho na mugenzi we (uhagarariye uwishwe akababarira uwishe ntiyihorere, ahubwo akaka impozamarira), (uwiciwe) azayikurikirane mu buryo bwiza kandi (uwishe) na we azayitange ku neza. Uko ni ukoroherezwa n’impuhwe biturutse kwa Nyagasani wanyu. Uzarengera nyuma y’ibyo (agahora nyuma yo gutanga imbabazi no kwakira impozamarira), azahanishwa ibihano bibabaza
